issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

comment.body:
I'm not able to reproduce this issue with 5.0.167 version.

I can reproduce it only if I add:
```adblock
digi.no,tu.no##main > div > div[class*=" "]:has(:is([id*=skyscraper i],[id^=brand i]))
```
to user rules, but as mentioned, this rule has been removed 2 days ago (https://github.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/commit/b18d322ff964156aceec713532c8e1962d0e36bd).

<hr>

Please try to update extension manually.
To do that, open `chrome://extensions/`, enable `Developer mode` and click on the `Update` button.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1f7d5ec8-b4f6-4e54-b2c6-e53ba788a65e)

</details>

If issue still occurs, please try to add:
```adblock
digi.no,tu.no#@#main > div > div[class*=" "]:has(:is([id*=skyscraper i],[id^=brand i]))
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

issue.title: heureka.cz

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175394) if other issue.

issue.title: wisw.online

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://wisw.online/risks-of-over-optimization-of-forex-market-trading/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwisw.online%2Frisks-of-over-optimization-of-forex-market-trading%2F) ### Comment > In all the years of using ad blockers, I have never seen a response as stupid as BlazDT!! > You idiot, when you tell me that "Not enough visitors" means that you are not qualified to deal with the problem in the first place! Of course, there are not many visitors because it is a link shortening site. We do not want to visit that site itself, but we want to continue through a few clicks on the "Next" option until we reach the final download link!! > > I will explain the problem in simple steps: > First, visit the following link: > https://linkjust.com/sqnBrlF > Here AdGuard is detected and we cannot continue with the links. If we hide this message that says that you have an ad blocker, the "Next" button will disappear with it (in rare cases, the button remains), but in general, hiding the message is a completely ineffective solution. > I hope that someone with a brain will be assigned to solve this problem, thank you. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://wisw.online/risks-of-over-optimization-of-forex-market-trading/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwisw.online%2Frisks-of-over-optimization-of-forex-market-trading%2F) ### Comment > In all the years of using ad blockers, I have never seen a response as stupid as BlazDT!! > You idiot, when you tell me that "Not enough visitors" means that you are not qualified to deal with the problem in the first place! Of course, there are not many visitors because it is a link shortening site. We do not want to visit that site itself, but we want to continue through a few clicks on the "Next" option until we reach the final download link!! > > I will explain the problem in simple steps: > First, visit the following link: > https://linkjust.com/sqnBrlF > Here AdGuard is detected and we cannot continue with the links. If we hide this message that says that you have an ad blocker, the "Next" button will disappear with it (in rare cases, the button remains), but in general, hiding the message is a completely ineffective solution. > I hope that someone with a brain will be assigned to solve this problem, thank you. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
I'm still unable to reproduce it (also on Android).
Do you still see these ads if you disable all third-party filter lists (also custom) and enable only AdGuard filter lists?
By third-party filter lists, I mean these:
```
EasyPrivacy
Peter Lowe's Blocklist
Adblock Warning Removal List
EasyList Cookie List
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List
Online Malicious URL Blocklist
Phishing URL Blocklist
Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin
uBlock Origin – Badware risks
```
and all custom filter lists and user rules related to Bing.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

issue.title: m.inven.co.kr

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

comment.body:
## AdGuard Content Blocker By the way @AdamWr, for **AdGuard Content Blocker** product support, would it be possible to bring back this original rule (before the editing then removing)? ```adblock @@||v.fwmrm.net/ad/g/1$domain=m6.fr (*) ``` ###### **(*)** Depending on how the **FreeWheel** component is configured, it could be `$script` or `$xmlhttprequest`. Can add both to the rule but better not to specify anything then, I would say.
Rule useful because if you simulate no JS/Scriptlet support (via `@@||m6.fr^$jsinject,important`) to be like this product, you will trigger the [AAB message](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/024cc83b-c2c6-4584-a1a4-80169dda8524) quite often (not always but just navigate from video to video and it'll trigger at some point). ✅ **Fixed** using the above rule ([screenshot](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3cc2e9f2-7561-43a3-821f-d89bf302ec32)) despite having ads of course for these users (no other choice, but at least the videos are accessible), while **not fixed** with only the HEAD request allowed ([screenshot](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7887efc2-9aed-442b-8807-04c97fd8a600)). For the latter, you can still add it too as a bonus to be sure / to be future-proof if you want using `@@||v.fwmrm.net/|$xmlhttprequest,domain=m6.fr` like @Yuki2718 did [originally](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/2630bfe7eeefa7004fd32080314bd38052c5c9a9) but doesn't seem required according to my tests. It's as you wish.

Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175394) if other issue.

I've also added an `id="cookie-banner"` to the cookie pop-up, to avoid the possible future case of a reused class being used to target the element.

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce, likely only loads with Chinese IP.
Your rule seems to block one useful script file.

Please check these two rules in user filter (one rule per line):
```
||m.ddyueshu.cc/*/$script
@@||m.ddyueshu.cc/*common
```

Not seeing anything blocked with AdGuard DNS, sometimes it takes a while and I see a loading circle and then it shows up as it should.

Please change DNS filtering to Google and enable DNS filter, so DNS blocking is done via AdGuard app. If it is still not working, please check filtering log.
